```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(knitr)
knitr::read_chunk(here("scripts", "load.R"))
```

```{r load}
```

```{r plot_movies}
movies_2004 <- read.csv2(here("data", "2004.csv"), sep=",")
names(movies_2004)
ggplot(movies_2004, aes(rating, budget)) +
  geom_point(colour="red") 


```
